title: Set $$f(x)=0$$
text: To find the x-intercept, let $$f(x)=0$$ and and solve for $$x$$.

title: Solve For The Parabola
text: Solve for $$x^2+8x+12=0$$. We can factor it as $$\left(x+6\right) \left(x+2\right)$$.

title: Solve For The Parabola
text: $$\left(x+6\right) \left(x+2\right)=0$$\nUse zero product property, we know $$x+6=0$$ or $$x+2=0$$ which gives the answer $$x=-6$$ or $$x=-2$$.

title: Put The Answer Into (x,y)
text: We know that $$y=0$$ in x-intercepts and we get $$x=-6$$, $$-2$$ through the calculations above. Put together, we get two x-intercepts-- $$(-6,0),(-2,0)$$.
